name: ts-fullstack-template
description: TypeScript fullstack template with Vue client and Node.js server

scripts.postversion: node scripts/update-version.js && npm run update-readme && git add README.md client/src/version.ts && git commit --amend --no-edit
scripts.update-readme: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const pkg=require('./package.json');const readme=fs.readFileSync('./README.md','utf8').replace(/\!\[Version\]\(https:\/\/img\.shields\.io\/badge\/version-[0-9]+\.[0-9]+\.[0-9]+-blue\.svg\)/,`![Version](https://img.shields.io/badge/version-${pkg.version}-blue.svg)`);fs.writeFileSync('./README.md',readme);console.log('README updated with version ' + pkg.version);"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
